forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the sun casts its bright gaze over the city, offering a refreshing energy that invigorates the senses. With temperatures reaching a pleasant mid-50s, the crispness of the morning gives way to a warming afternoon, though only gradually. A gentle west northwest wind rustles through the streets, hinting at the ever-present maritime influence, yet the clouds loom lightly, promising a touch of potential rain as the night unfurls. The shifting panorama reveals a mostly clear sky above, but some hints of the infamous fog can be seen creeping along the horizon, particularly near the Golden Gate, gently rolling in, shyly covering the iconic bridge.

As the day progresses into evening, temperatures will dip to the low 40s; thus, a stylish yet practical layering of light jackets over long sleeves may bring comfort as the chill descends. Embrace the opportunity to wander the vibrant streets or perhaps settle into a cozy café, sipping a warm drink while observing the bustling life around you. The promise of rain may lead some to seek solace indoors, but for those with a spirit for adventure, a late afternoon stroll along the waterfront can be delightful, especially against the backdrop of the colorful sunset against a slowly clouding sky.
